entry.title: Soft Serenity Solid Face Towel (Buff) - Set Of Four
entry.summary:
Vendor: Micro Cotton
Type: Hand & Face Towels
Price: 999.00

Why settle for ordinary when you can bask in the lap of luxury every time you step out of the shower? Crafted from the finest materials and woven with care, this towel isn't just an accessory – it's an experience.

1. The product includes a set of 4 face towels.
2. The size of the product is (13x13 inches) or (33x33 cms).
3. The weight of the product is 330 gm.
4. The material of the product is cotton.
5. The GSM of the product is 500.
6. Machine wash in cold water under 30°C.
